lines: khyad par ma pham rgyal ba'i mdun sa che
dga' ldan byang gi 'dzin mar 'phos 'dra ba
gang 'di bslab gsum sbrang rtsi'i rgyal mtshan gyis
sum rtsen gnas kyi skyed tshal bzhin gyur cig
bdag blo 'od stong ldan pas 'gro 'di yi
snying gi mun pa mtha' dag 'phrog pa dang
blo bzang rgyal ba'i bstan pa bde blag tu
phan bde'i 'byung gnas rtag tu gsal byed shog
rnam dag bsam pas snying la 'grogs pa na
'dod pa'i don kun mchog tu gegs med par
sras bcas rgyal ba bstan srung chos skyong gis
thugs rje kho nas 'bad med 'grub gyur cig
dbyig gi blo gros ma 'di'i mnga' bzang po
phan dang bde ba'i khur gyis rab ngal zhing
mchog gsum rin cen mthu dpal rmad mnga' bas
thub bstan phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i bkra shis shog
de slad ngang pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma
bdag gi yid mtshor rtag tu rol cig dang
sdebs legs snyan pa'i ngag gi rtsed 'jo yis
blo gsal yid kyi brtan pa 'phrog par bya
dge legs rdul mang brtsegs pa'i lhun po'i rtser
dge tshogs stong gi byed pos nyer bskrun pa'i
dge mtshan ri mo sna tshogs bkra ba can
gnas 'dir rgyal ba'i dbang po tsong kha pa
ye shes lnga yis mngon par byang chub cing
yid srubs bdag po'i g.yul ngo pham byas nas
theg mchog lha yi rnga dbyangs rgya cher bsgrags
zab gsal gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis
zung 'jug rgyal ba'i go 'phang la 'dzegs pa
grub pa'i dbang po rnams kyi zhal sgo las
bla med theg pa'i chos char rgyun du 'bab
gangs can bstan pa'i chu bo ma lus pa
gang nas 'bab pa ma dros dbang po ste
'og min chos kyi pho brang nyams dga' ba
kha ba can 'dir dal gyis 'ongs sam ci
bslab gsum sbrang rtsi spyod pa'i 'phur lding mkhan
legs bshad bung ba'i glu dbyangs snyan sgrogs pas
yongs gang chos kyi dga' tshal 'di mthong tshe
bde ba can yang skrag nas nub tu bros
'di ni blo gsal gsar bu'i tshogs rnams kyang
gnyis med rgyud sde'i rgya mtshor bgrod pa na
gsang ba kun gyi mdzod gyur kA la pa
kai la sha yi gangs ri'i phag tu yib
lung dang rigs pa'i gad rgyangs mthon po can
smra ba'i seng ge bye ba'i bsti gnas gang
dpal ldan ma pham gangs ri'i dbang po 'dis
'phags pa'i yul yang mtha' 'khob lta bur byas
'chi med bdud rtsi'i phun tshogs la 'god pa'i
lo ma'i khu ba ngur smrig kha dog can
'dod rgur spyod pas lha yi 'byor ba yang
rab tu skyengs te lhun po'i steng du bros
theg pa gsum dang grub mtha' rnam pa bzhi
kun gyi rtse mor son pa mtshon pa'i phyir
lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis
'di la btud cing bkur ba mtshon pa'i phyir
'gro la 'jig rten dbang po srong btsan gyis
dbang bskur sa 'dzin mchog gis ngos nas brten
bden bral phyogs nas gnyis 'thung dbang po yis
rab brtan yid bzhin nor bu'i phung po las
phun tshogs yid la 'dod pa kun 'jo bas
kun gyi re ba'i 'bras bu rdzogs par byed
rab gsal gser gyi phye ma'i gos 'chang ba
sa 'dzin bu mo mchog tu gus pa yis
yan lag brgyad ldan chab kyis rab gang ba'i
mchod yon brgya phrag du mas mdun nas mchod
pha rol rgol ba 'joms pa'i tsher ma rno
chos tshul rnam grangs du ma'i yal gas phyug
mdun na tsan+dan ljon pa'i nags tshal la
srog chags sna tshogs dga' zhing rnam par 'phyo
'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i phun tshogs kun
rings pa rings par gnas 'dir lhags pa na
de la 'gran 'dod chu klung mdzes ma rnams
lhung lhung sgra snyan sgrog cing phyogs 'dir 'bab
ngo mtshar ri mo lta bas mi ngoms shing
rmad byung byin rlabs gzi 'od stong 'bar ba
sa gsum skye rgu yongs kyi mchod bya'i gnas
rgyal ba'i sku gdung rin cen 'di na bzhugs
gzhan yang rgyal ba sras bcas sprin tshogs las
dngos grub 'dod rgu'i char cher rtag 'bab cing
chos skyong srung ma'i nus pa'i me dpung gis
nag phyogs 'byung po'i rtsa lag mtha' dag bsregs
de phyir rgyal ba mchog gi grub pa'i gnas
gangs can phan bde'i rtsa lag gcig pu mchog
'di yi ngo mtshar ri mo bgrang ba la
'jam dpal dbyangs kyang blo gros ngal bar gyur
de slad slar yang rgyal ba tsong kha pa
de yis dam la btags pa'i mthu stobs can
srung ma'i tshogs kyis thub dbang bstan pa'i srol
gnas 'dir dar zhing rgyas pa'i bka' drin stsol
bstan 'dzin rnams kyang rnyed dang bkur sti la
re ba spangs nas bshad sgrub lhur len zhing
de yi mthu las dge 'dun mthun pa dang
dge 'dun don rnams kun kyang 'grub pa shog
gnam ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad tshul du gnas
rgyab ri rgyal po gdan la bzhugs pa 'dra
rgyal ri byang chub sems dpa' zhes su grags
phu na gnod sbyin rta sgo shel lcags kyi
pho brang gangs dkar shel gyi mchod rten las
te se'i gangs bzhin chu bo phyogs bzhir 'bab
byang shar ri bo rgyal chen rnam thos sras
sgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol ba'i tshul
rin cen bdun las khyim bdag rin po che
rgyal mtshan ri bo dmag dpon rin po che
ber dmar gyon nas pha rol dpung tshogs 'joms
shar phyogs ri bo'i ngos der dpal be'u dang
bum pa gser nya gyen la 'phyo byas mdzes
shar lho glang po rta mchog rnam pa gnyis
rin chen khur khyer gnas der 'ongs pa 'dra
mdun ri 'bru yi phung po spungs pa la
nags tshal rab rgyas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang
sher phyin snying po a yig rnam par bkra
nub phyogs sman btsun rgyal mo phyug mo ni
btsun mo rin chen de bzhin nub byang gi
padma'i lte bar dung dkar g.yas su 'khyil
g.yas g.yon ri gnyis rtse mo cha brgyad pa'i
rin cen dbang gi rgyal po nye bar mtshon
rgyab ri'i g.yon phyogs dpal ldan re ma ti
rgyal ba'i bstan srung bka' yi bya ra mdzad
de dbus sa gzhi g.yu yi maN+Dal bzhin
dbyibs legs chos kyi 'byung gnas lte bar ni
mchod pa lnga sogs mtshan rab mdzes pa yis
steng du byang chub chos kyi gzhal med khang
dge 'dun 'dus pa rgya mtsho'i bsti gnas mchog
sras bcas rgyal ba'i 'phrin las spel ba'i gzhi
ngo mtshar legs bshad sgrog pa'i dga' tshal mchog
yun ring gnas la dar zhing rgyas gyur cig
nyer mtshon rgyal ba'i ring bsrel snying po can
bgrang yas mchod rten mu tig do shal ni
rab 'chang nor 'dzin bu mos deng dus su
mkhas rnams yid kyi brtan pa ci yang phrogs
dus kyi mtha' la lha yi 'jig rten ni
sa la 'ongs so da lta yar klungs zhes
grags pa'i gur kum gyis 'di springs yig ni
mtha' dag phyogs kyi 'gram pa dag la chags
kai la sha yi ri bo mthor brtsegs par
'gran slad rgyal ba'i chos sku ma lus pa
gzugs su bgyis la dgon thang mchod rten zhes
da lta yul de'i sa yi thig ler gyur
byin rlabs gzi 'od stong 'bar nyi ma ste
dngos grub 'dod rgu'i char 'bebs yid bzhin dbang
bsod nams lo tog bskrun pa'i nor 'dzin ma
phan bde kun gyi 'byung gnas gang 'di'o
de lta na yang dus ring lo mang gis
'dus byas mtshan ma'i zlos gar ston pa na
gser gyi thur ma brgya yis mtshan pa'i gdugs
padmo'i gnyen la rab 'khu nor bu'i tog
rab mdzes gsar du bzhengs 'dra'i byi dor ni
byos zhes 'khor los sgyur gang bka' stsal gyis
man+dA ra yi me tog 'thor ba na
skya rgyal dbang po'i cod pan du bcings nas
'phyos lung 'dzin ma rab skyong 'khor bcas kyis
skyo ngal spangs pa'i shing rtar khur blangs nas
legs par bsgrubs shing rgyud sde'i dgongs pa bzhin
gzungs gzhug rab tu gnas pa grub par bgyis
gang gi dad dang snying stobs bdud rtsi'i mtsho
mi dbang bka' lung zla shel zer 'phreng gis
rab 'phyur ngo mtshar dge mtshan dba' rlabs ni
mtha' dag phyogs kyi 'khor lo 'gengs par brtson
de yi rnam dkar nyi 'od dang 'grogs pas
sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde rnam bzhi yi
'dab brgya bslab gsum sbrang rtsi'i zil mngar can
thub bstan pad tshal phyogs bcur rgyas par shog
khyad par 'gro 'di bsrung mdzad yid bzhin nor
ma lus sa skyong tshogs kyis phyag bya'i gnas
ngag dbang bkra shis grags pa'i rgyal mtshan mtho
gong ma chos rgyal chen po khu dbon rnams
rin cen lhun po sa 'dir rtsen de srid
lugs gnyis rnam dkar mdzad pas sa chen po
chos bzhin skyong ba'i bkra shis mchog tu stsol
gnas 'dir dge tshogs kun gyi byed pa po
bstan pa'i sbyin bdag 'khor dang bcas rnams kyang
sgrib gnyis spangs nas sku gsum go 'phang la
dka' ba med par myur du 'dzeg gyur cig
gnas skabs 'dir yang nyer 'tshe kun dang bral
chab srid dpal 'byor dbyar mtsho bzhin du gang
rtag tu bstan dang bstan 'dzin mchod byed cing
gnas skabs mthar thug bzhed don kun 'grub shog
gang yang dad pas mthun rkyen du 'os pa'i
phu dud bgyid pa'i sbyin bdag thams cad dang
gzo yi rig byed rnams dang las byed pa
kun kyang myur du kun mkhyen thob par shog
phyin chad nas kyang mchod rten chen po 'di
cung zad mchod dang phyag dang bskor ba sogs
sgo gsum dge tshogs lhur len thams cad kyang
sgrib bral chos sku myur du thob pa dang
gnas skabs 'dir yang rang rang bzhed pa yi
'dod pa'i don kun gegs med thob par shog
yangs pa'i sa chen 'dir yang dus kun tu
lo legs char chu dus su 'bab pa dang
nad dang 'thab rtsod 'khrug long kun zhi nas
'gro kun bde zhing dge la spyod par shog
shAkya'i rgyal po'i lung rtogs bstan pa dang
gong ma chen po'i sku tshe chab srid dang
sbyin bdag chen po rnams kyis bzhed don rnams
rtag tu dar rgyas lhun gyis grub par shog
dge mas yan lag bdun ldan mchog stsol cig
bgrang yas rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa'i chu 'dzin las
ji snyed khams dang bsam pa'i dbye ba bzhin
grangs med gdul bya'i snod yangs 'dzin ma'i gzhir
dpag med chos kyi nyal 'gro gang 'bab pa
yongs su 'khyil ba'i chos tshul chu gter che
kun gyi rab dang phul dang snying po ni
dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus bskyed pa'i yum
shes rab pha rol phyin pa gang 'di'o
gdengs can grangs kyis bcings pa'i stong phrag gis
nyer mdzes shes phyin 'phreng ba can zhes pa
gnam sngon bzhu ba 'khyil 'dra'i shog bu'i ngos
gser 'od kyis 'khrigs yig 'phreng man+dA ra'i
dbu ba rab gsal mig gi bdud rtsi 'di
dpal ldan rig pa 'dzin pa'i cod pan ni
snang grol thar pa rgyal mtshan zhes bya'i rigs
'phyos lung nor 'dzin chos bzhin skyong mdzad pa
skya rgyal chos kyi dbang phyug 'khor bcas kyis
dpal 'byor rol mtsho kun nas 'khyil ba'i gnas
gtong ba yangs pa'i dpal las legs par bzhengs
ding sang sor mo'i zlos gar sgyur ba la
kun gyi bshes gnyen dang mtshungs dpon mo che
ngag dbang bkra shis dpon slob rnams kyis bris
de las 'ongs pa'i rnam dkar phung po ni
gzugs su grub gang srid gsum 'gengs par des
nang so rdzong dpon bsod nams bkra shis pa
mched bcas yab yum thugs dgongs yongs rdzogs shing
sgrib gnyis rnyog pa'i dri ma kun dag nas
sku gnyis zung 'jug mngon du 'gyur bar shog
rgyal ba'i bstan pa gus pas mchod pa la
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang mtshungs pa
rgyu sbyor sbyin pa'i bdag po 'khor bcas kyang
thugs rgyud sgrib gnyis ma lus dag gyur nas
tshogs gnyis nor bu'i them skas la 'dzegs te
sku gsum rin cen khang bzang du son cing
lhun grub rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'phrin las kyis
'gro kun srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog
gnas skabs su yang sku tshe chab srid dang
chos dang srid kyi 'byor pa'i phun tshogs kun
yar ngo'i zla ltar rtag tu gong 'phel zhing
rang phyogs bdud sde'i g.yul las rgyal gyur cig
'di yi phyir du sgo gsum longs spyod kyis
mthun rkyen lhur len skye bo thams cad kyang
gnas skabs tshe 'di'i bsam don kun 'grub cing
myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen gyur cig
bod khams nor 'dzin skyong ba'i dbang po ni
gong ma chos kyi rgyal po khu dbon rnams
sku tshe srid mtha'i bar du brtan pa dang
chab srid mtshan dus ches cher gong 'phel shog
deng nas yangs pa'i rgyal khams kun tu yang
'thab rtsod 'khrug long nad dang nyer 'tshe zhi
char chu dus su 'bab cing lo legs sogs
rdzogs ldan dus bzhin rtag tu phun tshogs shog
nyi 'od stong gi 'byung ba'i gser gyis ni
ri dbang dbang po'i gzhu yis 'khyud pa lta'i
byang phyogs skyong mdzad dpal ldan rnam thos sras
'khor dang bcas pas 'dod rgu'i dpal skyed mdzod
rgyal ba'i bka' dang dam tshig la gnas
mthu ldan ye shes srung ma 'khor bcas dang
stobs ldan 'phyos lha la sogs gzhi bdag rnams
dkar phyogs chos bzhin skyong ba'i bkra shis stsol
shAkya'i rgyal po'i lung rtogs bstan pa dang
sbyin bdag chen po'i sku tshe chab srid dang
lus can kun gyi phan bde ma lus pa
rtag tu 'gran bzhin 'phel ba'i bkra shis shog
mchog stsol phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyi yab
snang ba mtha' yas padma'i gar gyi gtso
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas mngon sum bzhin
ngo mtshar zhing gi bkod pa 'di bzhengs pas
chos bzang mtshan can lnga par gshegs de nyid
sems kyi rdo rje dri ma dag gyur te
khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpar skad cig la
spyod cing ris med bstan pa'i sri zhu mkhan
'phyos lung 'dzin ma skyong ba 'khor bcas rnams
lugs gnyis phun tshogs kun gyi rtser son te
bde ba can du chos la spyod par shog
rin cen mang sprul sa brgyad dbang phyug tshul
byang phyogs skyong ba'i dbang po 'khor bcas kyis
phyogs 'dir rdzogs ldan dus bzhin dngos grub kyi
chu bo thams cad gegs med 'du bar mdzod
mtshan gyi me tog rna bar lhung bas kyang
ngan 'gro las bsrung bde ba can du spyod
dug gsum nad sel sku gsum go 'phang mchog
stsol mdzad bcom ldan sman pa'i rgyal por 'dud
'dod khams dbang phyug bstan ma 'khor bcas kyis
bka' bzhin phyogs 'dir thub bstan rgyas pa dang
bdud dang mu stegs tshogs kun gzhom par mdzod
grangs med phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis kyang
'dul bar mi spyod snyigs dus 'gro ba kun
'dren mdzad rang bzhin stong nyid rten 'byung gi
don du legs gsungs thub pa'i dbang por 'dud
dpal ldan gri gug lcam dral 'khor bcas kyis
lha chos bdun ldan bka' gdams bstan pa'i srol
ches cher rgyas shing sbyin bdag 'khor bcas rnams
bar chad nyer 'tshe kun las bsrung bar mdzod
phun tshogs bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan bzang po'i
gzi 'bar 'gro la legs byas ngom pa bzhin
lha mi'i ston pa mtshan legs rgyal po zhes
'jig rten gsum na grags 'bar de la 'dud
rgyal ba'i bstan srung mi thung srin po'i gzugs
gur gyi mgon po lcam dral bka' sdod bcas
thub pa'i bstan dang sbyin bdag 'khor bcas la
log par lta ba'i dgra bgegs gzhom par mdzod
rin cen zla dang padmas rab brgyan pa'i
mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs rgyal po zhes
mtshan tsam 'dzin pa'i 'gro 'di skal bzang du
legs mdzad smra ba zla med de la 'dud
skal bzang mig la bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa
gser bzang dri med zhabs rdul spyi bos mchod
skal bzang rgyal ba kun gyi bstan srung che
yul 'khor srung dang dpal ldan 'phags skyes po
'jig rten skyong ba bcu sogs mthu ldan gyis
gnas 'dir re ba'i rgya mtsho gang bar mdzod
sdug bsngal gsum gyi klong zab g.yo ba can
srid mtshor nyen pa'i 'gro 'di'i sdug bsngal dang
mya ngan kun sel 'gro ba'i sman pa mchog
mya ngan med mchog dpal la gus phyag 'tshal
dpal ldan stobs 'phrog nag po chen po dang
'jam dpal bka' nyan chos kyi rgyal po yis
bstan dang bstan 'dzin bstan pa'i sbyin bdag la
log par 'khu ba'i dgra bgegs tshar chod cig
zab yangs chos kyi gaN+Di'i sgra dbyangs ni
'jig rten gsum du sgrog mdzad gang gi zhabs
tshangs dbang zur phud dud pas bsten 'os pa
chos grags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la gus phyag 'tshal
he ru ka dngos rdo rje nag po che
bya rog mtshan can 'khor dang bcas rnams kyis
'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub char chen po
'dod rgur phab pas phyogs 'dir gang bar mdzod
zab zhi spros bral mtha' dbus med pa'i klong
brjod bral rang rig ye shes spyod yul can
gzigs pa mthar phyin dpe bral chos kyi sku
mngon mkhyen rgyal po gang der phyag bgyid do
bstan dang mdo sde'i dbang po phyag mtshan du
legs bzhes spyan mi bzang dang rnam thos bu
gnod sbyin sde dpon bcu gnyis 'khor bcas kyis
sngon gyi thugs dam bzhin du 'gro 'di srungs
sa gsum 'gro ba'i gtsug rgyan mi'i dbang po
ngag dbang bkra shis grags pa'i mtshan can gyis
dbang sngon glegs bu'i ngos la man+dA ra'i
gser gyi 'od ris 'khrigs pa'i thugs dam gyi
bka' 'gyur 'dzam gling rgyan gyur gang de las
stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i zhabs dum 'di
'phyos lung nor 'dzin skyong ba dad 'byor can
mgon po tshe 'phel zhes byas mthar rgyas su
legs par bzhengs las gong ma mi'i dbang po
bskal brgyar seng ge'i khri la zhabs brtan zhing
bka' khrims bzang po'i nyi ma'i 'od stong gis
'dzam gling khyon kun cig car khyab gyur te
rgyal ba'i bstan dang 'gro ba'i phan bde yi
pad tshal phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i bkra shis shog
gang du bla ma rgyal ba sras bcas kyi
zhabs sen dri med mu tig 'od chags shing
sprul pa'i mtsho las zhi khro rab 'byams kyi
dkyil 'khor ngo mtshar gar gyi ri mo can
tshul gnas thos dang spong ba lhur len zhing
'dus pa'i tshogs kyi thun mtshams kyis dmar ba'i
dam pas lung bstan gnas chen chos 'khor rgyal
bkra shis lhan gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang
gang de'i gnas kyi bkod pa 'gro rnams kyi
mig gi bdud rtsir gsar du chags pa 'di
'phyos lung 'dzin ma'i khyon la dbang sgyur ba'i
gangs can pir thogs dbang po sman thang pa'i
ring lugs 'dzin par rab mkhas rig byed pa
bzhi 'dzoms zhes byas sor mo'i rtse las sprul
rnam dkar mchog 'dis rgyal ba'i bstan pa dang
mi yi dbang po'i sku tshe chab srid dang
ri mo mkhan gyi gnas skabs mthar thug gi
bzhed don 'gran pa bzhin du 'phel bar shog
gang sngon brjod du med pa'i bskal pa nas
bde chen chos sku mtha' dbus bral brnyes kyang
'gro ba'i don phyir slob dang mi slob pa'i
nam mkha' ji srid rnam rol cir yang 'char
grangs med gdul bya'i khams dang bsam pa bzhin
rgyal bas chos tshul ji snyed bka' stsal kyang
ched du bya ba'i gdul bya'i dbang nyid las
theg pa che chung sde snod gnyis su 'dus
srid pa'i phun tshogs gdug pa'i sbrul gyi khyim
rnying pa'i rtswa ltar mthong nas bdag med pa'i
lam nas zhi ba rin cen gling bgrod pa'i
thabs kyi bsti gnas rnam mang rgyal bas bkod
theg pa chen po 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyi
sku dang zhing khams 'khor dang mdzad pa ni
yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa lam nyid du
drang srong rjes mthun rnams la bya ba yis
nang gi rnal 'byor nyi ma snying la 'char
lha mo rnams dang phan tshun blta ba las
byung ba'i bde ba lam byed bya ba'i rgyud
phyi rol bya ba'i thabs dang nang gi ni
zab mo rnal 'byor cha las snyoms par spyod
'dzum zhing dgod pa'i bde bas rnam rol ba
yan lag bzhi la gzhol ba spyod pa'i rgyud
phyag rgya bzhi yi rgya las mi 'da' zhing
ting 'dzin gsum gyi lang tshos snying la 'grogs
lag pa'i padmo 'brel ba'i bde bar tshim
nang gi rnal 'byor gtso bor gyur pa'i rgyud
skye shi bar do ma dag 'khrul ba'i grong
sku gsum rin cen gzhal med nyams dga' bar
tshe gcig nyid la sgyur byed rim pa gnyis
yan lag dang bcas ston pa bla med rgyud
mngon mtho nges legs rin cen gzhal med khang
kun gyi rtsa ba 'gram gzhi brtan po ni
lhag pa'i tshul khrims rin cen gser gyi gzhi
gtso bor gtan la 'bebs pa 'dul ba'i sde
bying rgod dri yi bzhon pas mi g.yo ba'i
mngon rtogs rin cen rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin can
ting 'dzin 'chi med ri bo gnas pa'i gzhi
zab yangs mdo sde'i chu glang bdag po'o
chos kun gsal ba'i ting 'dzin mig stong ldan
gnas lugs rtogs pa'i ye shes lag nyal gyis
mthar lta'i mun pa 'dul byed lha yi dbang
chos mngon lta na sdug gi grong khyer gnas
de ltar sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhis
legs bsdus drang nges sna tshogs rgyal ba'i bka'
thub pas legs gsungs sdud byed 'phags pas bsdus
rgyal bas lung bstan shing rta che rnams kyis
drang nges legs par phye nas dgongs pa bkral
'phags pa'i yul sogs sa steng sa 'og dang
sa bla'i 'jig rten kun tu legs bzhugs pa
dri bral rgyal ba'i bka' yi tshigs bcad re
'dri dang bzhengs dang klog dang 'dzin pa yi
bsod nams phung po gzugs su grub gyur na
nam mkha'i khyon kun bkang yang ga la shom
de lta lags na mdo sngags rgyal ba'i bka'
phyogs 'dir 'gyur ro tshal rnams legs bzhengs pas
de yi bsod nams phung po 'di tsam zhes
rgyal ba'i ye shes spyod yul las gzhan ci
srid pa'i phun tshogs rtswa rtse'i chu thigs dang
glog 'phreng g.yo ba'i rol rtsed ltar dgongs shing
rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten bzhengs pa'i
gzhal du med pa'i bsod nams la dgyes pas
zas gtsang sras po slar yang byang phyogs 'dir
gser gyi ri dbang zol la nyer brten nas
bstan pa spel phyir dngos su byon pa lta'i
rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mthong ba don ldan dang
bde sogs bdag po'i gzhu yi dra ba yis
zla shel mtsho la gar gyi ri mo bzhin
rgyal ba'i skyes rabs mig gi bdud rtsi'i gter
bi shwa karma'i sgyu 'phrul ci yang 'char
khyab par bai DUr+ya yi glegs bu'i ngos
rin cen gser dngul yi ge'i 'phreng chags pa
rgyal sras spyod pa ma lus gzugs can bzhin
bka' 'gyur 'dzam gling rgyan gyur legs par bzhengs
'di lta'i rnam dkar phung po zla ba'i 'od
nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par 'jug pa des
phyogs 'dir thub bstan mchod pa zla ba bral ba
bstan pa'i sbyin bdag nor 'dzin bdag mo yis
thog drangs 'di yi phyogs su sgo gsum gyis
dad pa lhur len 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
sgrib gnyis kun byang tshogs gnyis myur rdzogs te
sku gsum go 'phang myur du brnyes gyur cig
gnas skabs su yang dam chos sgrub pa'i rten
ji ltar bzhed pa'i gnas su legs 'khrungs te
ma lus rgyal ba'i dam chos 'dzin pa la
mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang mtshungs par shog
bod khams lus can kun gyi phan bde'i gzhi
mi dbang gong ma chen po khu dpon dang
bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po'i sku tshe dang
chab srid dar rgyas yun ring gnas gyur cig
de yi mthu las rgyal ba'i bstan pa dang
a ti sha dang mnyam med tsong kha pa'i
lam srol la brten phyogs dus kun khyab cing
'gro kun phan bde'i dpal la spyod par shog
ma lus rgyal ba'i mkhyen brtse'i chu klung stong
gang du gzung ba'i mar me mdzad dpal gyi
zab yangs thugs kyi chu mtsho chen po las
legs 'ongs rin cen dbang gi rgyal po 'di
sa gsum skye rgu'i re ba skong byed cing
mkhas pa klu dbang bye ba'i cod pan yin
gang 'di chos tshul kun gyi rab dang phul
'gro ba kun gyi phan bde'i sgo gcig pu
yin phyir bzhed dang 'dzin dang klog pa yang
bsod nams phung po su yis gzhal bar nus
thugs rje'i spyan ras stong gis dus kun tu
'gro la gzigs pa nam yang mi lhod pa
gang de'i spyod tshul chu skyes dkar po'i 'phreng
ngo mtshar dri bsung g.yo ba 'di nyid kyis
skal bzang dad ldan rkang drug ldan rnams kyi
yid kyi brtan pa cig car 'phrog par byed
de phyir kha ba can gyi yul gyi dbus
sa yi thig le ldan gyi 'chad gsham du
sde snod 'dzin pa chos lung dka' bcu pa
chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes byas bskul ba dang
khyad par rang gi dad pas nyer blangs nas
chos kyi rgyal po mnyam med tsong kha pa
yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag dge 'dun grub
sras dang bcas pa'i thugs dgongs rdzogs pa dang
sngags 'chang slob dpon bzang po la sogs pa
'das pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas thob phyir dang
rang rang pha ma'i sdig pa sbyang phyir bzhengs
de lta'i snying stobs yangs pa'i nam mkha' las
legs 'ongs glegs bam rta bdun rgyal po la
rab dgyes ze 'bru'i so 'phreng gsal ldan pa'i
phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i padmo 'dzum par mdzad
rab gsal shog bu'i shel gyi sa gzhir yig mkhan
'dir 'bad dge ba ri bong 'dzin pa ni
yid mkhar shar bas nyon mongs mun pa kun
bcom nas mtha' yas 'gro la phan bya'i phyir
kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob par shog
tshul 'dir mthun rkyen sgrub byed thams cad kyang
'di nas shi 'phos gyur tshe dga' ldan du
rgyal ba'i rgyal tshab byams mgon chos rje dang
mar me mdzad dang 'brom ston dge ba'i bshes
rgyal ba gnyis pa 'jam dpal snying po sogs
mnyes par byas nas rjes su 'dzin par shog
gnas skabs 'gal rkyen bar chad zhi ba dang
tshe ring nad med bde skyid 'phel ba dang
snyan grags ba dan 'bum phrag g.yo ba dang
rtag tu chos la spyod pa'i bkra shis shog
don gnyis mthar phyin ston pa shAkya'i tog
rgyal ba'i thugs rje gcig bsdus spyan ras gzigs
gtum chen khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo mgon
bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma rnams kyi bkra shis shog
bka' gdams bstan dang bstan 'dzin skyong ba la
mi zad stobs dang thogs med mthu ldan pa
phyag drug mgon po bstan ma bcu gnyis dang
dkar po brgyad cu rnams kyi bkra shis shog
gdod nas spros bral chos rnams kun gyi gshis
dri ma kun bral smra bsam brjod las 'das
gnyis med mnyam gzhag ye shes nam mkha'i klong
dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum der phyag bgyi'o
ji snyed rgya mtsho'i gos can rdul gyi grangs
nyung ngur byed gang rlabs chen spyod pa'i khur
ma lus 'gro ba sgrol ba'i thugs dam can
sar gnas dpa' bo rnams la'ang gus phyag 'tshal
mi mjed zhing 'dir bye ba phrag brgya yis
'dzam gling 'dzin ma'i lte bar cig car du
mngon par sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge des
chos sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong legs par phye
khyad par bya rgod phung po'i sa 'dzin rtser
bgrang yas cho 'phrul stong gi zlos gar dang
pha rol phyin tshul gtam gyis seng ge'i sgra
phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin du 'gro la bstan
gang de'i ji snyed chos kyi rnam grangs ni
kun gyi rab dang phul te nyon mongs pa'i
nad kun drungs nas 'byin pa'i sman dang ni
rgyal ba kun gyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam
'phags bzhi'i rin cen ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas
klu yi grangs ldan stong gis bcings pa yi
thub pa'i chos tshul kun gyi snying po ni
'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi yi ge'i gzugs
shes ldan snying la dwags pa'i chu bo dang
mig la bdud rtsi'i gru char 'bebs pa ni
ston dus nam mkha'i bu mo rgyu skar gyi
do shal 'chang ba'ang skyengs te bros pa bzhin
de lta'i glegs bam ngo mtshar bye ba'i gter
yar klungs zhes grags 'dzam gling sa la ni
gnas kyang phul byung yul gyi dge mtshan las
lha yi 'jig rten nyid du bgrang bya ba
bka' khrims nyi ma stong ltar phyogs bcur 'phro
gru 'dzin ri bo'i ngos su chos kyi sde
lugs gnyis phun tshogs ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas
ngur smrig 'dzin pa 'bum sde'i tshogs rnams kyis
sa 'dir thun mtshams gos dang ldan par byas
chos grwa chen po gang de'i bya 'dabs nas
bang mdzod rmugs 'dzin dbang po dang gcig pa
lha yi khang bzang sa la 'ongs pa lta'i
lca rgyab sbus khyim zhes byar grags pa dkar
gang der nor rgyun ma mtshungs bu dga' dang
gzhon nu blo gros bsod nams gzi 'bar ba
bstan pa rgyal mtshan yum sras rnam gnyis kyis
snying po med pa'i sgyu ma'i nor rdzas rnams
gzhal du med pa'i bsod nams snying por ni
bgyid slad gtong ba'i sgo 'phar brgya phye nas
grangs med ngo mtshar ldan pa'i gsung rab 'di
yab mes gong ma'i bka' drin bsab pa dang
myur du sangs rgyas go 'phang thob byed cing
gnas skabs chos ldan bzhed don 'grub phyir bzhengs
kun gyi bshes gnyen dang mtshungs yi ge pa
zla bral ngag dbang grogs mchog rnams kyis bris
lung rigs dbang phyug tshe dbang rgyal po yis
gnas 'dir legs tshogs bskrun pa'i grogs kun mdzad
bshes gyen blo gros mchog ldan dge legs kyi
mtshan dang ldan pas zhus shing dag par mdzad
de lta'i rnam dkar phung po mtha' yas pas
sbyin bdag 'khor bcas skye ba thams cad du
shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i chos tshul kun
bsgrub la rgyas ras kun dang mtshungs par shog
gnas skabs 'dir yang chos dang srid kyi ni
'byor pa yang ngo'i zla ltar rgyas pa dang
sngon tshe lha yi rgyal pos sher phyin gyi
mdo yi don bsams tshig rnams legs brjod pas
bdud sde'i g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bzhin
mi mthun bar chad nyer 'tshe kun zhi nas
phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal thob shog
bslu med dkon cog gsum gyi bden pa dang
chos skyong srung ma rnams kyi nus mthu dang
rgyu 'bras rten 'brel bslu ba med pa yis
smon pa'i gnas kun yid bzhin 'grub par shog
grags pa yi ge'i tshogs 'bar phyogs bcu yi
sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang gzhal bar mi spyod pa
rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa 'bar gyur cig
mkhas btsun skye bo kun gyis phyag byas pa
lung rtogs yon tan chos kyi rgya mtsho gang
bstan pa'i nyi ma gcig pus 'gro rnams kyi
'phrin las bzang po yun ring zhabs brtan cig
'jig rten dbang po'i thugs rje'i zla zer ni
gang du lhung bas mtha' 'khob mun pa'i gling
phan bde'i ku mud rab bzhad thub bstan gyi
gos dkar ldan pa kha ba can zhes grags
gang de'i nor 'dzin thig le dge ba bcu'i
bgrang yas yon tan gyis mdzes brgya byin gyi
grong khyer dus kyi sa la brten pa ni
thon gyi dga' ldan rtse zhes grags pa dkar
rin cen gzhal med rab mdzes ba gam gyi
'od tshogs bdud rtsi'i spu long rgyas pa des
'byor pa'i bang mdzod la skrag rmugs 'dzin kyang
khengs pa rab dor lhun po'i byang du bros
bstan pa gyen du 'degs pa'i snying stobs dang
bstan 'dzin gus pas mchod pa'i dad pa can
skye bo kun la sbyin pa'i lag rkyong ba
gang de mgon med zas sbyin min nam ci
lugs gnyis bya de'i sgyu 'phrul rol rtsed la
deng dus mi yi zol la brten rnams dang
mthon po'i rigs kyi shar gyi ri bo'i rtser
yon tan 'od dkar gyis mdzes zla ris ni
ri sras dpal 'phrog rdo rje bu khrid ces
grags pa'i ba dan dkar ba'i dad 'phyor las
gdod nas spros bral chos rnams kun gyi gshis
smra bsam brjod bral mnyam gzhag nam mkha'i ngang
ji snyed shes bya'i snang brnyan ci yang 'char
ma lus rgyal ba skyed mdzad rgyal ba'i yum
in+d+ra nI la'i mdangs chags glegs bu'i ngos
'od tshogs ga pur rab rgyas gser dngul gyi
dbyangs gsal lang tsho rab rgyas zlos gar mkhan
mig gi bdud rtsi'i slad du chas pa bzhin
ston dus sngo bsangs kun gsal mdzes ma ni
rgyu dkar do shal 'chang ba'i 'jo sgeg gi
'gran zla lhur len stong phrag brgya pa'i gzhung
mi zad bsod nams bye ba'i gter gyur 'di
legs byas rin cen skas las mtho ris kyi
gzhal med khang du 'dzegs gyur byang sems ma
chos dpal bzang mo'i thugs rgyud dri ma kun
sbyangs nas sku gsum mngon du 'gyur phyir bzhengs
mu tig 'phreng ba'i dpal 'phrog yi ge'i gzugs
tshar du dngar 'di snye mo'i mkhas pa che
sri thar legs pa don grub dpon slob ni
bcu phrag gsum gyis mig gi bdud rtsir bskrun
sde lnga'i gtsug lag gangs ri'i ngos dag las
legs 'ongs rgyun gsum ldan pas tshig don gyi
ma dag dri ma 'khrud byed dka' bcu pa
rin cen shes rab grogs mched rnams kyis so
tshul 'dir 'bad las rnam dkar phung po ni
zla 'od dang mtshungs 'jig rten gsum gang bas
dmigs yul sbyin bdag dang bcas 'gro ba kun
myur du bla med byang chub gnas thob shog
rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs bcur rgyas pa dang
sngon byung bskal pa mang 'das tshe
'jig rten rnam 'dren dbang po'i tog
rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chu gter ni
grags pa'i dba' rlabs gsal ba byung
gur kum gsar pas phyogs rnams kun
bri byed gar gyi ri mo bzhin
phun tshogs 'khor bcas 'jam pa'i dbyangs
mgon de'i mdun sar 'khod de la
snying stobs bdud rtsi'i chu gter ni
dbu ba rab gsal man+dA ra'i
'phreng 'dzin snying stobs chen po zhes
ut+pal phyogs kyi 'gram par 'phyang
de ni ngo mtshar ri mo stong
bkod pa'i zhing du mngon sangs rgyas
seng ge'i nga ros bdud kyi sde
gnyis 'thung tshogs rnams ring zhig 'dar
mar gad lhun po nyi ma stong
rings par spro la chas pa bzhin
bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan rnams kyis
'gro la legs byas ngoms pa gang
ka shi'i ras la mngon sum bzhin
mig gi bdud rtsir chags pa 'di
lha yul 'ol kha'i nor 'dzin gyi
thig le ngag gi dbang po zhes
grags pa'i ba dan dkar ba des
gus pas bzhengs las rnam dkar ni
zla 'od dang mtshungs nam mkha'i khams
gang bas gnas skabs bzhed pa'i don
chos ldan yid bzhin 'grub pa dang
lnga par gyur tshe phyugs bdag gi
phyogs kyi ngo mtshar bkod pa'i zhing
mdzes byed mchog gi dbang po can
skad cig nyid la der spyon shog
gang gi zhabs sen 'od kyis reg pa'i rdul
bye ba phrag brgya'i tshangs dbang tshogs rnams kyi
zur phud dang 'grogs srid gsum bla ma mchod
nyi ma'i gnyen gyis 'gro 'di rtag tu srungs
sngon byon rgyal ba rab mang gtsug lag khang
'phreng bas rab mchod mgon med zas sbyin gyis
gsol btab ston pas dgyes bzhin gnang nas kyang
bgrang yas gser gyi rin gyis nags tshal mchog
nyos nas rgyal byed tshal zhes gtsug lag khang
sum rtsen dbang po'i gnas la 'gran pa byas
de yi grogs la 'phya sa shA ri'i bu
rgyal ba'i bkas btang thig rnams btab pa'i tshe
khro bas 'khrugs pa'i mu stegs byed dag gis
'gal bar brjod pas rtsod pa rnam mang byas
de nas mig dmar dag gi mthu
khyad 'phags bstan phyir der bos nas
mig 'phrul stobs kyis rab rgyas pa
sa ha ka ra'i ljon pa bstan
shA ri'i bu yi mthus blangs pa'i
'jig rung rlung chen shugs kyis ni
rtsa ba nas bton dum bur gyur
des sprul padma rgyas pa'i tshal
shA ri'i bus sprul glang pos brdzis
mgo bo bdun pa'i brang 'gro ni
shA ri'i bus sprul bya khyung gi
gshog rlung gis 'phangs des bkug pa'i
ro langs shA ri'i bu yis ni
phur bu btab cing rig sngags kyis
bskul bas mig dmar gsod du song
skrag nas nga rgyal btang byas te
shA ri'i bu yi zhabs la gtugs
de yis chos bstan 'dod chags bral
dag pa'i byang chub thob par gyur
de yi spyad zung reg tsam gyis
las byed zol gyis 'khu ldan pa'i
mu stegs tshogs rnams byams ldan zhing
khams dang bsam pa'i rang bzhin las
chos bstan dgra bcom gnas la bkod
de nas gtsug lag khang gi las
gegs dang bral tshe shA ri'i bus
'di dang dus mtshungs dga' ldan du
rin cen gtsug lag khang chen grub
ces smras mgon med zas sbyin ni
spro dang dad pa'i gzhan dbang gyur
de nas bcom ldan rgyal ba ni
'chi med tshogs kyi zhabs 'bring bcas
phebs tshe mgon med zas sbyin gyis
'gro ba'i bla ma de la ni
rgyun du bzhugs slad de nyid phul
de yi bkod pa phyogs 'dir mngon sum bzhin
ngo mtshar mig gi bdud rtsi 'di nyid ni
sa yi dbang phyug dpal ldan a mo g+has
mgon med zas sbyin slar yang 'ongs bzhin bzhengs
mgon med zas sbyin sras mo ri skyes kyi
mdzes pa la 'god ma ga d+ha bzang mo
grong khyer bu ram shing 'phel zhes byar ni
khyu mchog byin gyis legs pa 'dzin par byas
der ni nam zhig gyos po khyo sogs kyis
'dzems med pa rnams mchod mthong chags bral las
e ma khyod ni gnas min dag la gus
zhes smad skyengs las de dag gis smras pa
khyed kyi yab kyi khyim du ji 'dra dag
mchod ces dris tshe sa gsum bla ma ni
shAkya'i rgyal po 'khor bcas mchod ces bshad
de yi zhal bzang mthong ba'i skal ldan du
bdag cag nam zhig 'gyur zhes smras pa la
khyed cag rnams la bdag gis de bstan zhes
ma ga d+ha bzang gis smras gsol btab pas
rdzu 'phrul mchog ldan dge slong tshogs rnams ni
de yi dga' las rta yi shing rta dang
seng ljon 'phreng bas rab mdzes ri bong dang
char sprin dang ldan gdong lnga'i shing rta dang
kai la sha mtshungs gnyis 'thung dag dang ni
mkha' lding dbang pos rab drangs shing rta dang
'ga' zhig skyil krung mnyam par bzhag bzhin dang
gser gyi rta la yangs pa'i 'khril shing gis
nags tshal dag dang rin cen gzhal med khang
khyu mchog dbang po ngang pa'i rgyal po dang
la la nags tshal dag na bzhugs bzhin dang
'ga' zhig dpung tshogs yan lag bzhi ldan pa'i
'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs dang ri dang ni
phyogs mtshams rnams dang nor 'dzin khyon rnams dang
mkha' ngos las kyang rnam mang rdzu 'phrul gyi
rnam bkra rin cen khri dang bzhon par gnas
grangs med rmad byung dge slong tshogs 'di byon
de nas sa gsum gser 'od kyis 'gengs shing
nam mkha' khyab pa'i lha tshogs kyis mchod bzhin
bcom ldan rgyal ba de yi khyim du byon
der ni yo byad rdzogs pa sna mang gis
mngon par mchod de kun gyis phyag 'tshal te
ma ga d+ha bzang khyo sogs sde dang bcas
grong pa'i skye bo kun dang bcas pa la
chos bstan chos mig dri med bskyed par mdzad
de yi bkod pa phyogs 'dir mngon sum bzhin
dbang po'i gzhu ltar rnam par bkra ba 'di
bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chos rgyal a mo g+ha
rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba dpal bzang pos
legs par bzhengs las dus kyi mtha' 'dir yang
thub pa'i bstan pa phyogs bcur rgyas pa dang
bstan pa'i sbyin bdag sku tshe chab srid dang
cho ris dpal 'byor yar ngo'i zla ltar rgyas
mgon med zas sbyin ma ga d+ha bzang ltar
bla med byang chub go 'phang myur thob shog
bka' gdams yid bzhin rin cen gzhal med khang
ma rungs snyigs ma'i rlung dmar gyis bslad pa'i

ming tsam ri mo'i gnas la spyod pa na
slar yang dpal ldan mar me mdzad dpal ni

blo bzang rgyal ba kun dang ngang gcig pa

mgon po mchog de'i sras dang de sras sogs

'phya ba gsal byed gtsug lag khang gi 'phreng

bslab pa gsum ldan sde snod gsum spyod pa'i
snags 'chang dge 'dun grangs las 'das pa spel
bshad sgrub bya bas thub pa'i bstan pa ni
slar yang rdzogs ldan dus bzhin gsal bar mdzad

dpal ldan 'phags pa'i yul la co 'dri zhing

ga sha gtsang ma'i gnas na ca cor gyur

chos 'byung nor bu'i me long du gsal bas

mi zad lo yi lang tsho ma
smin drug zla ba'i yar ngo yi
rol bas rnam par brtson pa'i tshe
dge 'dun rgya mtshos dbyangs su bsgrags

theg mchog dge ba'i gshes dang mi 'bral shog

thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa de yis mthus
myur du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par shog

phun tshogs gzhal du med pa'i snying po ni
mdzad phyir dpal ldan 'bras spungs 'dus pa'i sder
rlabs chen byams pa'i smon lam legs par btsugs
sa skyong bye ba'i ral pa'i zur phud ni
gang gi zhabs sen rdul 'phreng la chags pa
gong ma chos kyi rgyal po khu dbon gyis
sku tshe chab srid brtan cing rgyas pa dang
yab mas gong ma'i thugs dgongs yongs gang zhing
phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas bya'i phyir
tshogs gnyis 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las
ngal dub med par bskrun pa'i dpal mo ni
sangs rgyas bstan la dad cing lugs gnyis kyi
phun tshogs dpal 'byor kun 'dzoms gang de yi
thugs dgongs snying stobs yangs pa'i nor 'dzin gzhir
rlabs chen dge tshogs dpag bsam ljon pa ni
'gro la phan bde'i 'bras bzang stsol ba can
snyan pa'i dri bsung 'phro ba gang 'di 'khrungs
bstan pa'i srol chen phyogs 'dir dar zhing rgyas
blo bzang gsung rab dgongs don gsal byed pa'i
dge 'dun rgya mtshos sa steng gang bar shog
sbyin bdag chen pos gtso mdzad phyogs 'di yi
'jam dpal snying po'i bstan la dad bgyid pa
kun kyang nyer 'tshe'i dgra las rgyal gyur te
phan bde'i dpal la 'dod rgur spyod par shog
gang 'dir 'bad pa lhur len thams cad kyang
dga' ldan gnas su nges par skye ba dang
phyogs 'di'i skye rgu ma lus rtse gcig tu
blo bzang bstan la dad pas 'jug gyur cig
ma pham rgyal ba'i dbang po'i mdun sa 'dir
yid 'phrog lha yi ba dan 'di phul bas
ma tham thugs rje'i lcags kyus legs drangs te
dga' ldan gnas su chos la spyod pa dang
gnas skabs bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po yi
sku tshe chab srid cho ris dpal 'byor sogs
phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin du 'phel ba dang
rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs bcur rgyas par shog
grangs med gdul bya'i khams dang bsam pa bzhin
rgyal bas chos tshul ji snyed bka' stsal kyang
ched du bya ba'i gdul bya'i dbang nyid la
theg pa che chung sde snod gnyis su 'dus
srid pa'i phun tshogs gdug pa'i sbrul gyi khyim
rnying pa'i rtswa ltar mthong nas bdag med pa'i
lam nas zhi ba rin cen gling bgrod pa'i
thabs kyi bsti gnas rnam mang rgyal bas bkod
theg pa chen po 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyi
sku dang zhing khams 'khor dang mdzad pa ni
yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa lam nyid du
byed dang mi byed sngags dang pha rol phyin
drang srong rjes mthun rnams la bya ba yis
nang gi rnal 'byor nyi ma snying la 'char
lha mo rnams dang phan tshun lta ba las
byung ba'i dge ba lam byed bya ba'i rgyud
phyi rol bya ba'i thabs dang nang gi ni
zab mo rnal 'byor cha la snyoms par spyod
'dzum zhing rgod pa'i bde bas rnam rol ba
yan lag bzhi la gzhol ba spyod pa'i rgyud
phyag rgya bzhi yi rgya las mi 'da' zhing
ting 'dzin gsum gyi lang tshos snying la 'grogs
lag pa'i padmo 'brel ba'i bde bas tshim
nang gi rnal 'byor gtso bor gyur pa'i rgyud
skye shi bar do ma dag 'khrul pa'i grong
sku gsum rin cen gzhal med nyams dga' bar
tshe gcig nyid la sgyur byed rim pa gnyis
yan lag dang bcas ston pa bla med rgyud
mngon mtho nges legs rin cen gzhal med khang
kun gyi rtsa ba 'gram gzhi brtan po ni
lhag pa'i tshul khrims rin cen gser gyi gzhi
gtso bor gtan la 'bebs pa 'dul ba'i sde
bying rgod dri yi bzhon pas mi g.yo ba'i
mngon rtogs rin cen rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin can
ting 'dzin 'chi med ri bo gnas pa'i gzhi
zab yangs mdo sde'i chu klung bdag po'o
chos kun gsal ba'i ting 'dzin mig stong ldan
gnas lugs rtogs pa'i ye shes lag nyal gyis
mthar lta'i mun pa 'dul byed lha yi dbang
chos mngon lta na sdug pa'i grong khyer gnas
de ltar sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde
legs bsdus drang nges sna tshogs rgyal ba'i bka'
thub pas legs gsung sdud byed 'phags pas bsdus
rgyal bas lung bstan shing rta che rnams kyis
drang nges legs par phye nas dgongs pa bkral
'phags pa'i yul sogs sa steng sa 'og dang
sa bla'i 'jig rten kun tu legs bzhugs pa
de ltar mdo sngags bka' ni grangs mang yang
dgongs 'grel tshad ldan dag gis ma bkral bar
byis pa'i skye bos rang dgar 'jug mi nus
de phyir dgongs 'grel mkhas rnams phyag bya'i gnas
thub dbang mkhyen brtse'i cod pan dkar po ni
gang gi dbu la bkod nas rgyal tshab tu
legs par dbang bskur rgyal tshab mi pham mgon
dga' ldan lha brgya'i gtsug rgyan de la 'dud
'jam dbyangs gzhon nu phyag na padma dang
rdo rje 'dzin dang rdo rje snying po sogs
byang chub sems dpa'i 'grel pa mdzad rnams la
rtag tu yan lag mchog gi phyag bgyir 'os
klu sgrub yab sras thogs med sku mched dang
rigs pa'i dbang phyug rnam gnyis yon shag sogs
rgyan drug mchog gnyis zhes byar grags pa dkar
gzhan yang mkhas dang grub pa'i skye bo ni
'phags pa'i yul dang o rgyan kai la sha'i
dum bu sogs su legs byon mdo sngags kyi
dgongs 'grel tshad ldan mtha' dag phyag bya'i gnas
gangs ri'i 'phreng bas yongs bsor 'dzin ma'i gzhi
phan bde'i 'od kyis snang mdzad mkhan slob gnyis
rgyal dang rgyal sras sa skyong tshul 'dzin pa
rgyal blon byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dud
shAkya'i dbang po slar yang ngur smrig gi
zlos gar lhur mdzad dpal ldan a ti sha
lnga brgya'i gtsug rgyan de dang spyan ras gzigs
mi yi gzugs 'dzin rgyal ba 'brom la 'dud
klu sgrub snying po slar yang gangs can 'dir
grub pa'i tshul 'dzin 'jig rten gsum mgon zhes
grags pa'i ba dan dkar ba khu dpon nas
legs brgyud gdung rabs mchog la bsngags par 'os
thub bstan ming tsam lhag mar gyur pa'i dus
slar yang nyi ma stong ltar gsal mdzad pa
blo bzang rgyal ba gnyis pa yab sras dang
rjes 'brang zla bral mkhas grub rnams la 'dud
grub pa'i rigs 'khrungs grub pa mchog brnyes kyang
khrims gnyis mdzad pas sa chen legs skyong ba
chos kyi rgyal po 'brom ston spyan ras gzigs
sras kyi thu bo grub mchog tshul khrims 'bar
mgon de'i gdan sa bka' gdams bstan pa yi
'byung gnas dam pas phu na rab mdzes
mda' na chu bo chen po dal gyis 'bab
bar na dge bcu tshang ba yul gyi mchog
tshe rabs sngon mar rlabs chen sbyin pa la
spyad pa'i 'bras ldan phyogs gcig tshogs pa gang
lcang lo can gyi grong khyer byang phyogs 'dir
gsar du 'ongs la bya mig ces su grags
ston pa nyan thos bcas la sri zhu ni
lhur len khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni
slar yang bstan dang bstan 'dzin mchod pa'i slad
gsal bar 'ongs la dpon bkras pa zhes grags
gang de khu dbon sras dang bcas pa yi
chu shing bzhin du snying po med pa'i nor
gzhal du med pa'i snying por mdzad bzhed nas
thog mar gser dngul las grub bka' 'gyur dang
rgya bod mkhas grub du ma'i thugs kyi bcud
mtshan dpe'i gzi 'bar ma pham rgyal ba'i sku
dad pa'i chu gter che las legs bskrun nas
phyogs 'dir lo paN thugs rje can rnams kyis
kha ba can gyi bstan dang 'gro ba la
phan slad ji snyed bsgyur rnams phyogs gcig tu
bsdus las bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal zhes bya
de dag kun dang jo bo yab sras kyi
gsung rab dri med glegs bam rin po che
rdo rje 'chang dbang ngur smrig gar mdzad pa
rje btsun tsong kha pa yi bka' 'bum rnams
ston dus sprin bral kun gsal mdzes ma'i ngogs
grangs med rgyu skar 'khrigs pa'i do ra bzhin
sngo 'jam shog bu'i ngos la gser dngul gyis
yi ge mig gi bdud rtsir bskrun pa 'di
'di phyi'i legs tshogs ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas
bla ma gong ma'i thugs dgongs rdzogs pa dang
phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal ba'i bstan pa ni
phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas pa dang
thub bstan nyi ltar gsal mdzad bstan 'dzin gyi
skyes bu mchog rnams zhabs pad brtan pa dang
sku drin che ba'i pha ma sku mched sogs
bsod nams skas las mtho ris gshegs rnams kyi
sems kyi rdo rje sgrib gnyis dri ma yis
dag nas rgyal ba'i thugs kyi rdo rje ni
legs thob slar yang nam mkha'i mthas klas pa'i
yang yang drin gyis bskyangs pa'i sems can kun
srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'ching ba las grol nas
sku gsum rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob phyir bzhengs
rgyal ba'i bka' dang tshad ldan bstan bcos kyi
tshigs bcad re re bzhengs pa'i bsod nams kyang
gzhal du med na 'di lta'i gsung rab tshogs
bzhengs pa'i dge tshogs tshad ni 'di tsam zhes
rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa'i spyod yul las gzhan ci
de yi mthu las phan bde'i sgo gcig pu
shAkya'i rgyal po'i lung rtogs bstan pa ni
phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas gyur cig
bka' drin mnyam med dpal ldan bla ma mchog
chos kyi dbyings su snyoms par zhugs rnams kyi
thugs kyi dgongs pa yongs su gang ba dang
sbyin bdag nyid la shin tu drin che ba'i
yab yum mched sogs sku gshegs thams cad kyang
rgyun ring rnyog pa'i dri ma kun dag nas
myur du sangs rgyas sa la reg gyur cig
de lta'i go 'phang mngon du ma byas pa'i
tshe rabs kun tu'ang dal ba'i rten thob cing
theg mchog bshes dang mjal nas theg pa mchog
zab dang rgya che'i lam la 'jug par shog
rgyal ba'i bstan dang bstan 'dzin mchod pa la
dpa' zhing rtul phod gtong ba ches yangs pa'i
bsod nams dpal ldan dpon bkras pa dang ni
bstan pa dar rgyas rgyud par bcas rnams kyang
yongs 'dzin dam pas rjes bzung a ti sha
yab sras rnams dang rje btsun tsong kha pa'i
'khrul med gdams pa'i srol bzang la brten nas
theg mchog chos kyi dpal la longs spyod shog
gnas skabs sku tshe ri dbang ltar brtan cing
chos dang 'jig rten dpal 'byor longs spyod rnams
'gran pa bzhin du ches cher rgyas gyur nas
rnam thos sras dang skal ba mnyam par shog
bdud dang nad gdon bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kyis
nam yang mi tshugs ji ltar bzhed pa'i don
gnas skabs mthar thug smon pa'i gnas rnams kun
'bad med lhun gyis grub pa'i bkra shis shog
rnam pa kun gyis mchog ldan stong pa'i gzugs
rnam med dbyings dang ro gcig bde ba che
rigs rnams kun gyi khyab bdag rdo rje sems
'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
de yi dam pa'i don gyi mtshan brjod pas
gnyis med rgyud rnams kun la nges ster ba
byang chub sems dpa'i 'grel pa skor gsum gyis
legs par bshad pa'i lam srol du zhugs pa
'di ni mkhas pa kun gyis 'jug ngogs te
tshe gcig nyid la sangs rgyas sar bgrod pa'i
lam gyi snying po phyogs 'dir mkhas gzhan gyis
gsal bar ma nus sngon med legs bshad de
rnam bshad mchog 'di kun la spel slad du
par du bsgrubs pa'i rkos dang yi ge yi
rig byed e yi mkhas pa kun bzang mched
tshig dang don gyi dag byed rig gnas lnga
dkar 'jam par shing glegs bu'i tshogs rnams ni
pho brang gzhis ka stag rtse nyid nas gnang
par du bsgrubs pa'i mthun rkyen yo byad rnams
bla ma'i bka' bzhin sgrub pa'i zhabs 'bring pa
gsung rab rgya mtshos dad gus ngang nas bsgrubs
'di yi dge bas 'bad pa lhur len rnams
myur du rdo rje 'chang gi gnas thob cing
gnas skabs su yang 'jig rten 'jig rten las
'das pa'i legs tshogs ma lus 'grub gyur cig
rnam mang rin cen phra bkod 'dzam gling rgyan
kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin la 'gran pa 'di
thub bstan mchod la ma ga d+ha bzang bzhin
nor 'dzin bdag mo bkra shis bu 'dren gyis
drin can yum gyi dgongs pa gang ba dang
bstan dang 'gro ba'i phan bde rgyas phyir phul
de yi dge tshogs srid gsum khyon gang bas
gnas skabs bstan pa'i sbyin bdag yum sras rnams
sku tshe brtan cing mnga' thang chab srid rgyas
ma pham zhabs drung chos la spyod par shog
dga' ldan rgyal ba'i rgyal tshab mi pham mgon
snyigs dus mtha' 'khob skye bo 'dul ba'i phyir
bkra shis chos 'khor rgyal gyi gtsug lag tu
dngos su byon pa'i mdun sar bstan pa dang
bstan 'dzin mchod la mu tig 'khri shing ni
dus kyis slar yang byang phyogs byon pa lta'i
nor 'dzin skyong mdzad bkra shis bu 'dren gyis
gser gyi dbu skyes 'dab stong rab 'khrigs shing
g.yu yi tshom bu gcal du rab bkram pa
mig gi bdud rtsir gyur pa'i maN+Dal 'di
nor bu 'bar ba 'gu ru mthong dgar bcas
sprul pa'i bzo bos bsgrubs te phul ba yis
bstan pa'i sbyin bdag sku tshe chab srid dang
dpal 'byor mtshan byus 'gran pa bzhin du 'phel
mi pham mdun sar theg mchog bdud rtsi la
'dod rgur spyod pa'i skal ba mchog thob shog
mi pham mgon po dngos su bzhugs pa'i drung
bkod legs rin cen phra bkod maN+Dal 'di
kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin dang lhan cig tu
bstan pa mchod la mu tig 'khri shing ni
dus kyi mthar yang byang phyogs byon pa lta'o
nor 'dzin bdag mo bkra shis bu 'dren gyis
nor bu 'bar ba 'gu ru mthong dgar bcas
mkhas pa'i bzo bos bsgrubs te phul ba yis
bstan pa'i sbyin bdag sku tshe chab srid dang
dpal 'byor mtshan byus 'gran pa bzhin du 'phel
mi pham mdun sar theg mchog bdud rtsi la
'dod rgur spyod pa'i skal bzang mchog thob shog
mi pham mdun sa dga' ldan pho brang du
bstan 'dzin phun tshogs dge 'dun sde 'phel zhing
bstan pa'i bya ba mdo sngags bshad sgrub kyang
yar ngo'i zla ltar rtag tu rgyas par shog
dad 'byor gtong phod ldan pa'i sbyin bdag che
dad ldan rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po
sku tshe ring zhing chab srid dpal 'byor rgyas
gnas skabs mthar thug bzhed don kun 'grub shog
byams brtse'i nyi 'od 'jig rten kun khyab ste
bar chad nyer 'tshe'i mun pa kun bsal nas
rang gzhan phan bde'i pad tshal rgyas par shog
mnyam med shAkya'i rgyal po'i lung rtogs kyi
bstan pa dri med phyogs bcur rgyas pa dang
'gal rkyen bdud sde'i bar chad kun zhi nas
ji ltar 'dod pa'i don kun 'grub gyur cig
phun tshogs dben pa'i gnas mchog chos 'khor rgyal
bkra shis lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang
dus gsum rgyal ba rgyal sras bka' sdod bcas
rtag tu dgyes shing rol pa'i pho brang 'dir
bla ma sangs rgyas byang sems du ma dang
'phags pa'i gnas brtan chos skyong srung ma mchog
rnams kyi sku gzugs du mas rab brgyan cing
gzhan yang bkra shis rtags brgyad la sogs pa
sna tshogs ri mo rnam dpyad bzhin du bkra
lhag bsam lta bur gzhi ma 'jam zhing mnyen
snyan grags bzhin du ba dan 'phur lding g.yo
mig gi bdud rtsi 'phan gyi 'phreng ba 'di
rgyal po'i pho brang 'phyongs rgyas stag rtse'i 'dabs
lha gnas dang mtshungs lha khyim dkar po nas
dad dang snying stobs gter gyur mgron gnyer dpon
lha bsam zhes byas phul bas rnam dkar tshogs
kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin la 'gran pa 'dis
rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus kun tu rgyas
bstan pa 'dzin pa'i skyes chen mchog rnams dang
bstan pa'i sbyin bdag che rnams zhabs brtan cing
dge 'dun sde rnams dge 'dun tshogs kyis gang
bslab gsum rgyan ldan dge 'dun rgya mtsho yi
'dus pa chen pos gnas 'di yongs gang zhing
rtag tu bshad sgrub 'phel ba'i bkra shis shog
de yi mthu las sbyin bdag mchog rnams kyang
sku gsum go 'phang myur du thob pa dang
'di nas tshe 'phos gyur tshe dga' ldan du
mi pham zhabs drung chos la spyod par shog
gnas skabs 'dir yang nyer 'tshe kun las rgyal
tshe dang bsod nams dpal 'byor snyan grags sogs
phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin du 'phel gyur nas
rtag tu dkon cog mchod pa'i bkra shis shog
bslu med dkon cog gsum gyi bden pa dang
bla ma yi dam rnams kyi byin rlabs dang
mkha' 'gro chos skyong rnams kyi mthu stobs kyis
ji ltar smon cing 'grub pa'i bkra shis shog
'phyongs rgyas stag rtse zhes byar grags pa dkar
de yi byang ngos rin cen ba gam can
ngo mtshar bkod pa'i ri mo rnam bkra ba
rmugs 'dzin dbang po'i mdun sa lcang lo can
gnyis pa lta bur mdzes pa'i khang bzang yod
der ni lha yi mtshan can dad pa yi
rgya mtsho kun tu 'phyur ba'i rlabs bskyod cing
rnam dpyod me long ngos la shes bya yi
ri mo sna tshogs bkra ba ji bzhin du
khang bzang rin cen brtsegs pa'i ngos dag la
dngos grub rtsa ba bla ma mchog rnams dang
thub pa'i dbang po gnas brtan bcu drug bcas
bstan pa spel phyir bsam bzhin byon 'dra dang
gzhan yang yi dam chos skyong 'dod lha'i tshogs
dngos grub char 'bebs sprin bzhin gtibs pa dang
chos 'khor rgyal gyi gnas dang dgon sder bcas
ngo mtshar ri mo'i snang brnyan du 'phos shing
dran pa tsam gyis 'dod rgu'i char 'bebs pa
gnod sbyin nor lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams
mig gi bdud rtsi ri mor chags pa 'di
bzhengs pa'i rnam dkar dung dang kun da ltar
mchog tu dkar ba'i ngo bo nyid skyes pas
zas gtsang sras kyi lung rtogs bstan pa dang
khyad par lha chos bdun ldan gdams pa'i srol
mnyam med tsong kha pa yi lugs bzang rnams
phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas gyur cig
thub bstan gus mchod sa chen legs skyong ba
mi dbang sku mched khu dbon zhabs brtan cing
chab srid mtshan byus mthon po'i rtser bzhugs nas
dbu rmog gong nas gong du btsan gyur cig
dad ldan sbyin bdag 'khor dang bcas rnams kyang
chab srid dpal 'byor sku tshe legs tshogs rnams
dbyar gyi chu bo bzhin du gong 'phel zhing
mi mthun bar chad nyer 'tshe kun zhi nas
rdzogs ldan dus bzhin bde la longs spyad nas
tshogs gnyis nor bu'i them skas la brten nas
sku gsum go 'phang mthon por 'dzeg gyur cig
bslu med dkon cog gsum gyi bden pa dang
mkha' 'gro chos skyong srung ma'i 'phrin las dang
rgyu 'bras rten 'brel bslu ba med pa yis
bden pa'i smon gnas yid bzhin 'grub gyur cig
bstan pa'i sbyin bdag 'ol kha stag rtse pa'i
mi yi dbang po sku mched zhabs brtan cing
chab srid mnga' thang cho ris dpal 'byor rnams
yar ngo'i zla ltar 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang
dga' ldan gnas su theg mchog bdud rtsi la
'dod rgur spyod pa'i bkra shis mchog tu stsol
bstan 'dzin skyong bar zhal bzhes bstan srung tshogs
srid gsum dbang sgyur 'dod khams dbang phyug ma
gnas gsum mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas pa yis
phyi nang mchod tshogs nam mkha'i khyon bkang ste
dgyes pa'i spyan gzigs rgya mtsho mtha' dag dang
yid 'ong grags pa'i ba dan dkar po 'di
bzhes nas bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan phyogs kun tu
bsgreng zhing mi yi dbang po 'khor bcas kyis
sku tshe chab srid mnga' thang mtshan byus rnams
phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin du 'phel ba dang
snyan pa'i grags pas sa steng kun khyab mdzod
grangs med dngos grub 'dod rgu'i char 'bebs pa
srid pa gsum na rgyal ba gnyis pa zhes
grags pa'i ba dan dkar des 'gro 'di srung
yar klungs zhes grags 'dzin ma'i dge mtshan ni
ma bzod mtho ris 'jig rten nam mkha' bros
bgrang yas ngo mtshar ri mo bkra ba'i slad

der ni 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs sen gyi
zla ba'i 'od chags gru 'dzin ri bo'i ngogs

lha mi'i phun tshogs gcig tu bsdoms pa bzhin
nam mkha'i skar tshogs nyung ngur bgyid pa yi

sa 'di thun mtshams gos dang ldan par byas
'byor pa'i chu bo ma lus 'du ba'i gzhi
bshad dang sgrub pa'i rlabs 'phreng stong g.yo zhing
mkhas mang lag 'gro'i tshogs kyis yongs gang ba'i
phul byung chos grwa yid bzhin rgya mtsho'i ngogs

sa la 'ongs 'dra legs bshad sgrog pa'i tshal
blo gsal bung ba'i tshogs rnams dam chos kyi

mgon med zas sbyin nyid du bsngags 'os pa
dal 'byor gtong phod ldan pa'i sbyin bdag gis
blo bzang rgyal ba'i dbang po'i ngo mtshar sku
mtho ris bzo bo'i 'du byed las grub pa
legs bzhengs gnas 'dir spyan 'dren mdzad pa na
dkar phyogs skyong ba'i lha yi tshogs rnams kyis
rnam bkra me tog char gyis 'dzin ma g.yogs
legs tshogs rten 'brel ma lus phyogs gcig tu
'bad rtsol med par 'grig 'di ches ngo mtshar
rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang
phyogs 'dir dge legs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir
byin rlabs ngo mtshar gzi 'od stong 'bar ba'i
phul byung nang rten bzhugs tshul 'di ltar lags
byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'byung ba'i gnas
'dod rgu'i rin cen gyis gtams za ma tog
'di ni kai la sha yi dbang po bzhin
rmugs 'dzin dga' ma dang bcas 'khor lo'i dbus
legs rten byin rlabs snang ba man+dA ra'i
dbu ba rab gsal mtho ris gang+gA ni
zla shar bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'phyur ba bzhin
de nas rgyal ba sras bcas mkha' la 'khrigs
sems dpa' rnams kyis me tog char du phab
dpa' mo rnams kyis shis pa'i glu len cing
gtum po khro bo'i tshogs kyis bgegs bskrad gyur
mkha' la nyi gzhon 'char ka'i rtse dga' ni
'dzin ma'i 'gram par gur kum 'god pa bzhin
shis brjod bung ba'i glu dbyangs snyan sgrog pa
chos bzang mdun sa mngon sum gyur pa bzhin
lus skyes spu long g.yo ba'i zlos gar mkhan
'dzum dkar me tog rgod pa'i rkang 'thung gi
'phreng ba rab spros lta byed rkang drug gi
dkyil 'khor zhal bzang chu skyes 'thung bar brtson
phyogs 'dir dengs nas thub bstan nyi ma ni
sgrib med legs spyad 'od zer stong 'bar bas
phan bde'i 'dab brgyad rtag tu rgyas 'gyur zhes
mtho ris 'jig rten kun gyis mthun par bsgrags
'di yi phyir du phyogs 'dir sgo gsum gyi
dad pa lhur len rnam dkar cha shas tsam
bskrun pa'i skye bo kun kyang dga' ldan du
'jam dpal snying pos bu bzhin skyong gyur cig
snyigs dus 'dir yang rgyal ba'i bstan pa ni
rdzogs ldan bzhin du dar zhing rgyas pa dang
bstan 'dzin lung rigs smra ba'i khrims ldan gyis
sa yi khyon 'di rtag tu gang bar shog
gong ma chen po'i sku tshe chab srid dang
rtsed thang chos grwa'i bshad sgrub bstan pa dang
sbyin bdag rnams kyi bzhed pa'i don rnams kyang
yar ngo'i zla ltar rgyas pa'i bkra shis shog
blo bzang mkhyen brtse'i gangs ri las 'ongs pa'i
grags pa rab dkar 'phrin las gang+gA'i rgyun
rgyun mi 'chad du 'jug pas sa gsum gyi
'gro 'di dri bral sku gsum thob gyur cig
dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan srung mthu rtsal can
srid gsum bdag mo dpal ldan re ma ti
gang de'i bka' nyan gtso mo bod khams skyong
rma ri rab 'byams rdo rje grags mo rgyal
'khor dang bcas la dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi
dgon gnas dge 'dun dang bcas gnyer du gtad
chos grwa che 'di g.yo med brtan bzhugs la
bsam sbyor ngan pa'i dgra bgegs gang yin pa
drag po'i chad pas myur du tshar bcad nas
gnas 'dir phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun 'du ba dang
bshad sgrub thub bstan dar zhing rgyas pa dang
srid zhi'i phun tshogs dpal 'byor ma lus pa
'bad med lhun gyis grub pa'i bkra shis stsol
rgyal ba'i bstan srung chen mo bka' nyan bcas
bstan pa spel phyir dngos su byon pa 'di
pir thogs dbang po sprul sku brgya lag pa
bsod nams bzang po'i phyag gis 'du byed yin
gnas skabs mthar thug bzhed don kun 'grub cing
sa steng dge legs kun gyis khyab par shog
